ingredients: 5 ears fresh corn, shucked 1/2 cup finely diced red onion 3 Tablespoons cider vinegar 3 Tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt 1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper 1/2 cup fresh basil leaves, cut into thin strips
